title: Hubble Bubble
description: Be careful what you wish for …Holly Grey only took up witchery to keep her friend out of trouble – and now she’s knee-deep in hassle, in the form of apocalyptic weather, armed men, midwifery … and a sarcastic Welsh journalist.Kai has been drawn to darkest Yorkshire by his desire to find out who he really is. What he hadn’t bargained on was getting caught up in amateur magic and dealing with a bunch of women who are trying really hard to make their dreams come true.Together they realise that getting what you wish for is sometimes just a matter of knowing what it is you want …
author: Jane Lovering
